resources.string: %1$s requires permissions of call logs to enable full functionality of %2$s
Enabling auto start will allow %1$s to log calls even when app is closed.
We will place a dummy call to ensure that everything is working as intended. Do not perform any actions until the test is complete.
A new version of this app is available.
You are all set to use %1$s.
Our team has been reported about this. You need to keep this app open in background to let it log your lead calls as expected. Do not kill this app! Contact support team in case of any issues.
